Posts.Content: Catharsis. This is why I am posting this thread the cocktail of influences in my life and the destruction of my intimate life because of prostate surgery diabetes high blood pressure low T and more cause a burden that is difficult to lift every day. I am 46 never married no children and now have real difficulty in justifying a close relationship with women particularly near my age. My intent is to keep pushing to this forum to hopefully one open ear so that this energy goes out to the universe and doesn't keep burying into my psyche like a screw. My current prospect is living alone with my dogs until they inherit my house.
Posts.Title: 2 years after surgery. single and the effects of surgery related impotence
